item.description:
Please join us for the first of our wild gathering events!

Iris Weaver- herbalist, gardener and intrepid forager will lead us on a search for wild edibles .

The earliest Spring greens and roots have been sought by humans as tasty, nutritious and rejuvenating foods for as long as we've been eating. Enjoy an early Spring outing and fulfill your inner Hunter/Gatherer!

1:00- Meet and greet
1:15- Head out to find the greens
2:30ish- Share a snack and learn about how to prepare what we have gathered

Please....
Wear appropriate clothing and footwear- it's going to be muddy
Bring a container for a small harvest
Bring a snack to share with others or get something from the farmstand
Be respectful of the farm grounds and operations
item.how_to_find_us: White Ford Focus near the entrance with a colorful attachment to the antenna
item.name: Early Spring Foraging
